description: The current min version of testtools (0.3.4) doesn't have the `message` parameter in `assertIn`, so we need to bump up to at least 0.3.6.
title: Minimum testtools version doesn't support message parameter in assertIn

comments.content: The current min version of testtools (0.3.4) doesn't have the `message` parameter in `assertIn`, so we need to bump up to at least 0.3.6.
